message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  I'm happy to pay $75 for the product.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm still willing to make a deal. I can offer you a compromise at 85. It's a great price for this amazing product, and I think you'll really love it.
Alice, I appreciate you trying to meet me halfway, but I'm still aiming to stay under $80. I'm willing to go up to $78 for the product.

I understand you're trying to stay under 80, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you at 82. It's a great compromise that still gets you a fantastic deal on this amazing product.
